Gainsborough Community Library

Manager: Mandy Grimwood

Clapgate Lane, Ipswich
IP3 0RL

Tel: 01473 260888
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Voices for Gainsborough Community Library
Social media: Facebook

Facilities

  • Free wifi available
  • Scanning, printing and photocopying facilities
  • Accessibility information
Room hire

Display space

Two cork boards in cafe area for posters

  • A5: 25p per sheet
  • A4: 50p per sheet
  • A3: £1 per sheet

Sunday 1100 – 1600

Regular events and activities

Event Days Times
Coffee morning in the cafe Tuesday 1030-1200
Club 4 Teens: video games and crafts for 13-19 year olds Friday 1530-1730

Mini Teenz: club for 8-12 year olds Thursday 1530-1645
New Age Kurling & Boccia: £2.50 per session, includes tea and coffee Tuesday 1400-1530
Scrabble club Wednesday 1400-1600
Singing for the soul Friday 1030-1100
Tinker, tea & talk and adult colouring: held in the community room Tuesday 1030-1200
Family colouring group Saturday 1130-1230
Bookstart singing Friday 1030-1100
Bookstart stay and play Friday 1100-1200
Craft activities: for primary school age children Sunday 1300-1500
Craft activities and games for children Saturday 1400-1600
Internet training sessions for beginners: drop-in Monday every 2 weeks 1030-1200
Absolute Beginners: book in advance Sessions arranged on a mutually convenient basis N/a
P.H.O.E.B.E self-esteem workshop: for 12-16 year old girls Monday 1600-1700
Sharing stories: for adults with learning disabilities and their carers Wednesday 1030-1200
Top Time: events and activities for older people Monday 1400-1600
